name: Ortega
description:
Ortega is the perfect accessory to add a bit of style to any outfit. Lightweight enough to wear inside at the office and warm for a jaunt across town. Handwoven with US milled organic cotton. 

Measures 25" x 25"

name: GÃ¼nta
description:
Whether you're stepping out for a night on the town, running errands here and there or having an afternoon hike in the wilderness, The Gunta Scarf is the perfect stylish accessory to keep you looking good and warm.
Handwoven with US milled organic cotton.

Measures 25" x 25"

name: A Mano Gris
description:
Herron Clothier would like to introduce our new Handwoven Home Collection. A Mano Gris is a hand woven pillow made with locally sourced hand spun and hand dyed wool. 

Measures 12" x 12"
Pillow form is 100% polyfill.

*Please note that due to the locally sourced hand spun quality of the fibers used to produce this item, A Mano Gris is limited edition.

name: A Mano
description:
Herron Clothier is proud to introduce it's new Handwoven Home Collection. A Mano is a handwoven pillow made with locally sourced hand spun wool, some of which was naturally dyed in sea water.

Measures 12" x 12"
Pillow form 100% Polyfil

*Please note that due to the locally sourced hand spun quality of the fibers used to produce this item, A Mano Gris is limited edition.

name: Sacre ON SALE Enter Code GOODBYESUMMER at checkout for 25% off
description: This collection of scarves was inspired by the ballet Le Sacre Du Printemps or The Rite of Spring. To commemorate it's 100th anniversary, The Sacre Scarf is the perfect accessory to march into Spring like a lion. Hand woven with 100% cotton in a lacy open weave. Infinity scarf, measures 16" x 60"

name: The Chosen One
description: This collection of scarves was inspired by the ballet Le Sacre Du Printemps or The Rite of Spring. To commemorate it's 100th anniversary, The Chosen One Scarf is the perfect accessory to march into Spring like a lion. Hand woven with organic cotton in a lacy weave. Infinity scarf, measures 16" x 60"

name: Mackworth
Munjoy
Longfellow
Elisse Scarf
description:
Back by popular demand, last Summer's Elisse Scarf was so highly coveted I decided to bring it back for a limited time. Elisse is a hand woven infinity scarf made from Bamboo/Tencel/Cotton, Measures 22" wide by 60" long. It's super silky and soft with a beautiful drape. Lightweight enough for a jaunt out on a brisk day and cozy enough for those more blustery outings. 

*PLEASE NOTE, THIS ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER. 
Please allow 2-3 weeks for your Elisse scarf to be custom woven just for you and shipped.

name: Penland Scarf
description:
This hand woven wrap scarf is made with organic cotton and linen and hand spun angora.  Measures 12.5" wide by 50" long


*This item is made to order. Please allow Three weeks for production and shipping. All orders are shipped USPS priority mail with insurance and tracking.

name: Bird's Eye Infinity Scarf
description: Wrap yourself up in this Hand woven infinity scarf, made with 40% Mohair, 30% silk, 20% bamboo and 10% cotton/linen. Perfect for brisk autumn days or chilly winter nights. Measures 16.5" wide  x 60" long.
